## Story

**As a** [user / role / persona]  
**I want** [goal / behaviour]  
**So that** [outcome / value]

---

## Context

- What problem are we trying to solve?
- Why is this important now?
- Links to any discovery, research, or previous issues:

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

> Tip: Make these **observable** and **testable**.  
> e.g. “Given X, when Y, then Z.”
